resources.string: Before you can save the world, you need a quick introduction...

...as you can see the world has been attacked by Dr. Toxic who is trying to pollute the world with waste. Your mission is to collect the waste and earn karma so that the world will become safe and clean for all humanity!
You have to walk to earn karma. The game will count your steps as long as it’s running in the background. With karma you can buy better modules and unlock bases
Modules represent different kind of waste you collect. Use your karma points to unlock them
There are different bases around the world that can help you remove waste. Once a base is unlocked, it will earn karma for you. To collect it you will have to visit the base
“You can never stop my plans of the new world filled with waste hahaha”
